title: Front Office - Client Support & Admin Assistant Needed FULLY REMOTE - FULL TIME
job_overview:
**This is a full-time independent contractor role. Candidates must be able to commit exclusively to this position and not engage in part-time or freelance work once hired.**

We’re super excited to announce that LedgerWay, a licensed USA CPA firm, is growing again - and this time we’re looking for an outstanding Front Office - Client Support & Admin Assistant to join our fast-moving, people-first team.
If you're someone who enjoys keeping things organized, making sure clients feel cared for, and solving small problems before they become big ones - keep reading.

What’s in it for you…
You’ll be joining a team of high-performing, kind, and driven professionals who genuinely love what they do. LedgerWay isn’t your typical accounting firm - we’re people-first, growth-focused, and all about helping our team thrive.

Here’s what’s waiting for you:
- A collaborative and genuinely kind remote team
- Supportive leadership that listens and invests in your growth
- Clear processes and systems to help you succeed
- Long-term stability with US-based clients
- Training, mentorship, and the freedom to learn new tools
- A workplace that respects your time, your energy, and your life

If you’ve been searching for more than just a job, this is your sign.

What’s needed from you…
To help us continue delivering top-tier service to our US-based clients, we need your customer service expertise and proactive energy. You’ll be part of a supportive team but also expected to own your role like the professional you are.

Oh, and one more thing:
To apply, please write “Every detail matters” at the top of your cover letter.

What you’ll be in charge of…
???? Client Communication & Front Desk Support
- Answer incoming client calls promptly and professionally
- Route calls to the appropriate teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
- Respond to client emails, chats, and inquiries with warmth and clarity
- Handle first-level customer service issues
- Keep communication friendly, professional, and on-brand

???? Document Management
- Request and collect client documents via the client portal
- Monitor submission deadlines and follow up as needed
- Upload and organize documents to the correct folders or systems
- Maintain client records with accuracy and care

???? Accounts Receivable & Payable Support
- Create and send invoices accurately and on time
- Help clients with billing questions or payment issues
- Track payments and assist with reconciliations
- Send reminders for overdue accounts (especially 60/90+ days)

???? Tax Admin Support
- Assist the tax team by collecting and organizing needed documents
- Upload tax forms and handle basic e-filing tasks (e.g., extensions)
- Maintain high levels of confidentiality and data security

About you…
If you’re friendly, curious, detail-loving, and a bit of a tech nerd - we want to meet you.
- Are fluent in English (spoken and written)
- Have a polished, warm, and professional phone presence
- Enjoy working with people and solving small problems with a smile
- Are organized and detail-oriented (you *love* a good checklist)
- Can manage tasks independently and ask great questions when needed
- Pick up new tools quickly (bonus if you already know QBO or CRMs)
- Have basic knowledge of US tax processes (a plus, but not required)

If that’s you, we’d love to chat.
Tech tools we use…
- Microsoft 365 (Excel, Word, Outlook)
- Microsoft Teams
- QuickBooks Online (QBO) – nice to have

Pay and benefits…
- Starting at Php 60,000/month (Tell us if you bring more value!)
- Annual reviews + performance-based raises
- 15 days PTO accrued annually
- 9 paid U.S. holidays
- Company-provided laptop, headset, and HD camera

Work hours…
Full time (40 hours/week)
You must be available from 9:00AM–5:00PM EST (US time zone)

How to apply…
Send a short and genuine cover letter to Upgrade to see actual info you're eager to make a meaningful impact and grow your career with a team that truly cares - LedgerWay is waiting.
Let’s build something amazing together!


Lauren M.
LedgerWay
